briefTitle: A Prospective Comparative Study Between Oncoplastic Breast Surgery and Standard Wide Local Excision
officialTitle: A Prospective Comparative Study Between Oncoplastic Breast Surgery and Standard Wide Local Excision:Margin Length and Patient Satisfaction
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Margins in all specimens measured in millimeters
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with macromastia in oncoplastic group.
* Tumors \>20% of breast volume in oncoplastic group.
* Young patients in oncoplastic group
* Tumors in medial or central quadrants in oncoplastic group

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients \>60 years.
* Patients with co-morbidities in oncoplastic group.
* Tumors \>20% of breast volume in standard group.
* Tumors in medial or central quadrants in standard group
